content.en: Nanophotonics revolution: Scientists are exploring the use of deep learning and machine learning algorithms to improve the design and understanding of nanophotonic structures. These algorithms are being used to predict electromagnetic responses, optimize the design of metasurfaces, and reveal the underlying physics of these structures. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, researchers hope to accelerate the design process and uncover new possibilities in the field of nanophotonics.
content.da: Nanofotonik-revolution: Forskere udforsker brugen af dyb læring og maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forbedre designet og forståelsen af nanofotoniske strukturer. Disse algoritmer bruges til at forudsige elektromagnetiske respons, optimere designet af metasurfaces og afsløre den underliggende fysik i disse strukturer. Ved at udnytte kraften i kunstig intelligens håber forskere at fremskynde designprocessen og afdække nye muligheder inden for nanofotonik.
